title: $:/litClock/times/-23:59-Marcel Aymé
quote_last: , Roquenton was holding his wife’s hand and giving her some last words of advice. On the stroke of midnight, she felt her companion’s hand melt away inside her own.
quoteSourceTitle: The Man Who Walked Through Walls

title: $:/litClock/times/-23:59-Cormac McCarthy
quote_first: Chigurgh rose and picked up the empty casing off the rug and blew into it and put it in his pocket and looked at his watch. The
quote_time_case: new day was still a minute away
